title: Resolve Advisors
description: We provide technology consultation and support to Resolve Advisors to build solutions for dispute resolution, conflict management and automation.

meta.title: Resolve Advisors
meta.description: We provide technology consultation and support to Resolve Advisors to build solutions for dispute resolution, conflict management and automation.

details.p: Since 1996 we have been working with private and government sectors in Australia and overseas.Our team has facilitated strategy and conversations, mediated disputes, designed and implemented stakeholder engagements and provided training from that experience.
details.p2: We use a core set of skills that empower and optimise our clients existing skillsets. We work across industries and sectors.The philosophy is always the same, creating a space and framework for our clients to excel.

contentwithImg.title: Cashmere Quality
contentwithImg.desc: Aura provided support to a large and complex project to simplify legal information across all states and territories in Australia. We work with multiple stakeholders to provide a comprehensive information resource around family violence law in Australia.

client.title: Client Feedback
client.desc: “Great partnerships are built on great relationships and company name have worked to build those strong bonds at all levels with our team at Michael Hill. Taking the time to learn our business, and develop ways of working that are right for us, has been a key factor in delivering our project goals.”
